Instruction: In a large bowl, mix flour, salt, and water until a soft dough is formed. Turn the dough out onto a lightly floured surface and knead briefly. Divide the dough into balls that are 2 inches in diameter and cover them with a damp cloth or plastic wrap.
Heat oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Place the rolled-out dough in the skillet and cook until golden brown, about 1 to 2 minutes on each side.

Heat a lightly oiled griddle over medium heat. Place rolled dough onto the pan and cook for 30 seconds to 1 minute on each side until golden. Serve immediately. Repeat until all dough balls are rolled and cooked.
